item.description:
Listen to Kristen Ford
My friend, Kristen...who is a super talented recording artist...is playing all songs off CD, "Filthy Nasty", acoustic and looping. Celebrate this old material as this is the last show before the big "Alone, Together" CD release next month. I'll also be playing totally new material with surprise guests. It's all free! 10pm sharp!


Located in Central square on the corner of Mass Ave and Brookline Street. Please let me know if you need to park your car at my place and walk up 8 short blocks to central square. Lauren
item.name: Free Acoustic Concert at The Middle East/ Kristen Ford
